info.pascalkrause.vertx.datacollector.job

Interface CollectorJob


  • public interface CollectorJob
    A generic interface which must be implemented to run the collection job inside the CollectorJobExecutor worker pool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.Future<CollectorJobResult>> collect(java.lang.String requestId, io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject feature)
      This method should be used to create a Future that contains the collection logic.
      io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.Future<CollectorJobResult>> postCollectAction(io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<CollectorJobResult> result)
      This method will be called after the collect(String, JsonObject) method and returns a Future which can be used to do some post-collect stuff like rough parsing or saving the result into a database.

    • Method Detail

      • collect

        io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.Future<CollectorJobResult>> collect(java.lang.String requestId,
                                                                        io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject feature)
        This method should be used to create a Future that contains the collection logic. The Future will be executed in a worker thread pool, which allows blocking operations inside the Future.
        Parameters:
        requestId - A request id to identify the collection request.
        feature - A JSON object to pass attributes and properties which are needed for the collection process.
        Returns:
        A Handler with the Future which contains the collection logic.

      • postCollectAction

        io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.Future<CollectorJobResult>> postCollectAction(io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<CollectorJobResult> result)
        This method will be called after the collect(String, JsonObject) method and returns a Future which can be used to do some post-collect stuff like rough parsing or saving the result into a database. The Future will be executed in a worker thread pool, which allows blocking operations inside the Future.
        Parameters:
        result - The CollectorJobResult from the previous called collect(String, JsonObject) method.
        Returns:
        A Handler with the Future which contains the post-collection logic.
